plot: Eleven Holocaust survivors remember their childhood before the war, and how their lives were changed when Hitler came to power.
title: We Played Marbles... Remembering a Stolen Childhood
plot_es: Eleven Holocaust survivors remember their childhood before the war, and how their lives were changed when Hitler came to power.
original_name: We Played Marbles... Remembering a Stolen Childhood
plot_en: Eleven Holocaust survivors remember their childhood before the war, and how their lives were changed when Hitler came to power.
